text: Gina Rinehart (born 9 February 1954) is an Australian mining company owner and billionaire. "Georgina Rinehart," Forbes (US); retrieved 2012-7-8. She is among the world's richest women.Bryant, Nick. The world's richest woman," BBC (UK). 9 June 2012; retrieved 2012-7-8. ==Early life== Georgina Hancock was born in Perth, Western Australia. She is the only child of Lang Hancock (1909-1992).Roarke, Allison. "Gina Rinehart: from mining magnate to Australia's newest media mogul," The Guardian (UK). 9 June 2012; retrieved 2012-7-8. ==Career== She is the head of Hancock Prospecting. She inherited the company from her father. ==References== Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:Australian businesspeople Category:Australian billionaires Category:People from Perth, Western Australia
title: Gina Rinehart
